claim.text: The framework QRNCA is architecture-agnostic and capable of handling long-form generation.
claim.exact_quote: The framework is architecture-agnostic and capable of handling long-form generation.

evidence.evidence_text: The framework QRNCA is designed to identify query-relevant neurons in LLMs, including long-form generation.
evidence.exact_quote: The framework QRNCA is designed to identify query-relevant neurons in LLMs, including long-form generation.

evaluation.justification: The claim is directly stated in the methodology section and is supported by the design of the framework.

claim.text: The framework QRNCA outperforms baseline methods significantly in identifying query-relevant neurons.
claim.exact_quote: Empirical evaluations demonstrate that our method outperforms baseline approaches.

evidence.evidence_text: The QRNCA method achieves higher PCR values compared to other baselines.
evidence.exact_quote: Empirical evaluations demonstrate that our method outperforms baseline approaches.

evaluation.justification: The claim is supported by empirical evaluations showing higher PCR values for QRNCA.

claim.text: The framework QRNCA can be used for knowledge editing and neuron-based prediction.
claim.exact_quote: We prototype two potential usages of identified neurons in applications such as knowledge editing and neuron-based prediction.

evidence.evidence_text: The framework QRNCA is shown to be effective in knowledge editing and neuron-based prediction.
evidence.exact_quote: We prototype two potential usages of identified neurons in applications such as knowledge editing and neuron-based prediction.

evaluation.justification: The claim is directly stated in the contribution section and is supported by the prototype applications.

claim.text: The framework QRNCA can identify localized knowledge regions in LLMs.
claim.exact_quote: We visualize the geographical locations of the detected neurons in Llama.

evidence.evidence_text: The framework QRNCA is shown to identify localized knowledge regions in LLMs.
evidence.exact_quote: We visualize the geographical locations of the detected neurons in Llama.

evaluation.justification: The claim is supported by the visualization of localized knowledge regions in LLMs.
